title: Embroidered Picture, ca. 1815
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation with linen lining
Technique: embroidered in long floating running stitches on plain weave
dimensions: Frame H x W: 33 x 27.9 cm (13 x 11 in.)
description: Basket of strawberries, wheat and flowers on a square pedestal in several colors. Gilded wood frame.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, ca. 1815.
ca. 1815. Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation with linen lining
Technique: embroidered in long floating running stitches on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. H.P. Davison. 1974-72-3.
